name: 72 Hours
description:
So 24 hours before the end of the LDJAM37 my cousin gave me call to ask me about making a game.

He is the Programmer and Developer, and I am the Game Design and Sound Producer.
We did not have so much time although we did the best we could!
This is our first game/concept we ever made together.

- 72 Hours -

the game is "simulating" a 72 hours of a man who want to have a chance and enter the LDJAM contest, but hes being disrupted constantly by random events, though he has to keep his mind and efforts on developing the game to make it on time!

the game should have a humorous feel and overall a big pile of funny censorious.

we liked the idea, and we're looking forward to keep develop it even further.
